item.title: Tools and Resources for R Users in Agricultural Research
item.description: This is a part of an effort to establish a CRAN task view for agricultural research. Feel free to contribute to this at our GitHub repository. You can find a prose version of this poster here.

item.title: Routine Incorporation of Spatial Covariates into Analysis of Planned Field Experiments
